name: Few-Shot Examples
description: Provides examples to guide the response format

structure.instruction: Here are some examples of the desired output format:
structure.task:
Now, apply the same format to:
Input: {actual_input}

example:
Here are some examples of the desired output format:

Example 1:
Input: Create a REST endpoint for user login
Output: POST /api/auth/login
{
  "email": "string",
  "password": "string"
}

Now, apply the same format to:
Input: Create a REST endpoint for product search
